description:
As Vegeta begins to disappear, Goku faces the duplicate Vegeta! But can he defeat the copy and save the original before he vanishes? And when the fight starts, is Vegeta rooting for…his clone?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku gegen Vegetas Kopie! – Wer wird gewinnen?
Goku vs. the Cloned Vegeta! Which One Will Win?!
Gokuu tai Fukusei Vegeta! Katsu no wa Docchi Da!?
悟空VS[たい]複製ベジータ! 勝つのはどっちだ!?
